title: My new sans
content:
hello everyone, I'd like to show you the sans I'm working on. I still have fix some details to fix like the width of the bold "u", but i think it's getting close to finish and maybe there is something escaping my eye. Could you please comment it?

I've also uploaded a pdf if you want to look at it more closely.

author: rui abreu

comments.content: Hi Rui: the small caps look a bit too tightly fitted in the text sample to me.

b might need more overshoot at the bottom - it floats a bit.

v and w are nice (might be a touch dark).

I like the i/j dots.

The fi ligature looks like a crash to me.

I might widen the u.
